text: Aniatachu nupang hah nâingei2:15: nâingei a nei sikin sanminringin om atih; aninônchu nâi a neina jârin minring nîng atih. a neina sikin sanminringin om atih, taksônna le lungkhamna male inthiengna ngei leh inpâkpuiloiin duoiloiin a tuongdier ngâiin 2:15: a tuongdier ngâiin chu; aninônchu an tuongdierin chu. chu.
